text: 2.15-16: Jop 31.19-20; Ru 3.11; 1 Zo 3.17Maaŋ muuŋgip, guigira nde phorgap Zisas khothɨgi guma o mbik, ana shaa mbatɨgeŋ kav, ana mba ki fhu, nde the ana gangip khaŋ ana suanga, “Ndu ŋgɨp, ndav mbɨrav kɨri. Ndu ŋgɨp, shaa shɨrav, fhav gurgurgip kɨri. Ndu ŋgɨp, mban mbegɨp, ndav givari.” Ndu maaŋ ana suanga, ndu ana kurkurarga bigɨn thueŋ mbui fhu, ndu mba nzuai kameŋ ram muuŋgip ana kurarie?
